it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters

Class DigestEquals

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.AbstractFilter<WarcRecord>
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.DigestEquals
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Predicate<WarcRecord>, Filter<WarcRecord>, FlyweightPrototype<Filter<WarcRecord>>

    public class DigestEquals
extends AbstractFilter<WarcRecord>
    A filter accepting only records of given digest, specified as a hexadecimal string.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public boolean apply(WarcRecord x)
        Apply the filter to a given WarcRecord
        Parameters:
        x - the WarcRecord to be filtered
        Returns:
        true if the WarcHeader.Name.WARC_PAYLOAD_DIGEST of the WarcHeader of x is not null and equal to the inner digest (hexadecimal comparison)

      • valueOf

        public static DigestEquals valueOf(String spec)
        Get a new DigestEquals that will accept only WarcRecord whose digest is a given string
        Parameters:
        spec - a string, that will be used to compare digests.
        Returns:
        a new DigestEquals that will accept only WarcRecord whose digest is spec

      • toString

        public String toString()
        A string representation of the state of this object, that is just the digest allowed.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string representation of the digest used by this object to filter records
